help: Command not found.
```!help command```
```!get name```
-Returns the link with the matching name
**Options**
`!get-link` or `!get-l` perform default function

message.notfound: No link with that name in the database

help: ```!add link, name, tag1, tag2, ...```
-Links must start with "http"
-Link names and tags may contain spaces, and are NOT case sensitive
Example:
```!addlink https://link, link name, first tag, second tag```
**Options**
`!add-tags` or `!add-tag` or `!add-t` may be used to add tags to specified links:
```!add-t name of link, tag1, tag2, tag3```
`!add-link` or `!add-l` will perform default operation.

message.nopermit: This command can only be used in permitted channels with permitted roles.
message.badlink: Only links beginning with http or https allowed!
message.noedit: Only OP can overwrite or edit their own links!
message.notfound: No link by that name in database.
missingarg: You must provide a link, name, and at least 1 tag.
Separate arguments by a comma followed by a space: `arg1, arg2`

help: ```!find keyword 1, keyword 2, ..., last keyword```
-Find will return any links whose names or tags contain any of the keyword terms
-Keyword terms may have spaces, but this will limit your search
**Options**
`!find-links` or `!find-link` or `!find-l` may be used optionally to specify a search for links
`!find-tags` or `!find-tag` or `!find-t` may be used to optionally specify a search for tags
Unsupported options will be ignored. Command will still execute links search by default.
*Note: If no keywords are entered in !find-tags, Find will return all tags from all links*

message.notfound: No results. Make sure to separate each keyword with a comma to expand search.

help: ```!delete item```
-Item names may contain spaces and are NOT case sensitive
-This command cannot be undone, and takes effect immediately
**Options**
`!delete-links` or `!delete-link` or `!delete-l` may be used optionally to specify deletion of links
`!delete-tags` or `!delete-tag` or `!delete-t` may be used to optionally specify deletion of tags within links
Unsupported options will be ignored. Command will still execute links deletion by default.

message.wrongop: Only OP can edit or delete their own links.
message.nopermit: This command can only be used in permitted channels by members with permitted roles.
message.notfound: That entry was not found in the database.
message.noinput: Please enter the name of what you want to delete.
